t: Cresent - High End Used Furniture
s: In 1947, Charlie Tomkins founded Cresent Furniture in Gallatin, TN. Charlie believed in solid wood bedroom furniture that was made well, but without the costs of expensive marketing and overhead hiking up the prices of his furniture. Word of mouth reputation made Cresent the brand they are today.
